description: Damon, an MMA fighter retires and goes to China to meet his new love, Meili. But things take an immediate turn when he inadvertently takes a package sought by an underground arms dealer. Now he must fight to save himself and his l...
name: Fist of the Dragon

review.name: Nothing new... a bit boring
review.reviewBody: This movie is boring... plain, and simple. The main character sounds and feels forced, all over the movie. MMA is a great sport, for those who enjoy fighting... but is not easy to create great movies, with MMA as a background-scenario... I, for one, found this movie to be bland, boring... it's something to be seen only when nothing better is on TV, and not to think much about it, for sure. I prefer a more active choreography, and a more compelling story than this. The movie tries (and fails) to resurrected the old 80'feeling in action movies, but fails, miserably. I compared MMA actors to WWE actors... with every other exception, they are not real actors... and fail with their tasks...
